documents.document: There are such beautiful places in the world that are ruined by disgusting people.

All I've done all week is drink and be hungover. Yes gawd.
@bookdepository Hi, I had 31 items in my basket yesterday and when I logged in today they are all gone. Does the cookies expire this quick?
@Conor_Merriman V proud of you for removing that one book making the list come WAY down to 31 booksâ€¦
@Conor_Merriman Youre now at 32 books... YOU DONT HAVE THE MONEY WALK AWAY
I have 23 books in my @bookdepository basket. Ranging from Stanley Kubrick to Carson Ellis to Taschen Publishing. Merry Christmas to me!

Hugely busy day tomorrow; Paper buying in the morning, illustrating a beautiful wedding in Meath, then illustrating the Film Fatale Party!
Off to Belgium in the morning! Exciting work ahead!!! #fashion #illustration

Hahaha bitch this flesh ain't to be stretched for just anybody - me, about sex

As I'm now finished college, it feels weird not returning. I'm now officially an adult... #brilliant
I'll never pass as normal, thank fuck!

Im finally home after spending 2 months travelling Asia! Fells weird to be back but looking forward to whats next.
@ThreeCare currently looking at options, just seen them in the Apple Store at a great price and wondered if the network would support it?
@ThreeCare Hi Three, I'm in Japan and I am hoping to buy an iPhone 6/Plus. I have an Irish sim, will the phone work when I return? Thanks!
@HigginsHeidi thank you! :)
@ThreeCare hi Fiona, thank you this is a great help! I appreciate it :)
@ThreeCare thanks Fiona really appreciate it! :)
@ThreeCare hi Fiona, I havnt looked into it properly yet but it would probably be the most recent iPhone 7 model? Is it worth the risk? :)
@ThreeCare hi, if I buy a simless iPhone 7 in Japan will it work if I return to Ireland? I already have a Three sim. Thanks!
